name: Delphorium
description:
Dive deep into the magical world of Delphorium - A Relaxing Deep Sea Musical
Experience.

Delphorium is a unique musical rhythm game with gorgeous neon aesthetics. It is perfect game to help you relax and unwind.

Please note that Delphorium is still under development. An android build for pre-alpha testing is available upon request.

To follow the game's progress follow me on Twitter.

This game was made for the 2018 Summer MyFirstGameJam.

Credits:
Music: Muz Station Productions & ANA-GO Record
